snippet: Family offices, which manage the money of the very wealthy, are now looking to outbid Wall Street for the people who run high-powered investment funds.
abstract: Family offices, which manage the money of the very wealthy, are now looking to outbid Wall Street for the people who run high-powered investment funds.

headline.main: Family Investment Funds Go Hunting for Wall St. Expertise
headline.print_headline: Family Investment Funds Go Hunting for Wall St. Expertise
